text:
Hazel Keech Takes #10YearChallenge, Admits She Had Depression And Would Starve Herself
Hazel Keech Takes #10YearChallenge, Admits She Had Depression And Would Starve Herself
If you still don’t know what #10YearChallenge is, you are probably living under a rock. It has taken the internet by storm. Social media feeds are flooded with people, including celebrities taking this challenge up.
However, Hazel Keech took this challenge to narrate a different story altogether. Through her post, she revealed how she has been battling depression and bulimia (an eating disorder). She calls it a #personalcelebration.
When Hazel Keech was 22-years-old, she “hid all the pain with a smile,” she wrote, adding “I was battling depression, starving myself, had bulimia, dyed my hair dark and kept it long trying to fit in and please everyone around me and joke so no one knew.”
Don't Miss 2.5 K SHARES 132 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES
Read her entire post below:
Hazel Keech shot to fame after her role in Salman Khan starrer Bodyguard. After her stint in Bigg Boss 7, she gained further popularity and became a house-hold name. Now, she is married to cricketer Yuvraj Singh and living happy healthy life.
